function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased demand for home amenities like pools, waterfronts, and docks may lead to overcrowding and increased contact, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Higher risk of contagion and transmission of diseases within communities and households.","Mitigation":"Enforcing social distancing measures in communal amenities, implementing cleaning and disinfection protocols, and limiting the number of users at a time.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, automated cleaning and disinfection systems, and occupancy monitoring software.","People":"Homeowners, home buyers, and visitors to residential amenities.","Owner":"Local authorities, property managers, and homeowners' associations."},{"Description":"Rising trend of intergenerational living may increase the risk of disease transmission within households due to close proximity and shared living spaces.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread between different age groups living under the same roof.","Mitigation":"Regular testing and monitoring, promoting good hygiene practices, and creating separate living spaces within the household.","Technologies":"Home air purification systems, remote health monitoring devices, and temperature screening tools.","People":"Families living in intergenerational households, especially the elderly and young children.","Owner":"Family members and household decision-makers."},{"Description":"Growing interest in gourmet kitchens may result in greater use of communal cooking and dining spaces, leading to potential contamination and the spread of foodborne illnesses.","Impact":"Increased risk of foodborne diseases and transmission of contaminants through shared kitchen facilities.","Mitigation":"Promoting food safety practices, encouraging individual cooking and serving, and regular maintenance of kitchen equipment and utensils.","Technologies":"Smart kitchen appliances, UV sterilization systems, and IoT food safety monitoring devices.","People":"Homeowners, family members, and guests using the kitchen facilities.","Owner":"Homeowners, property managers, and kitchen maintenance staff."}]}
